title: What happened to the plans for a Lowes food store in Hampstead at the corner of US 17 and Country Club Road? Some preliminary site work was done and then nothing since.
text:
We're told that the plans had called for work to be done by the end

of the year, but most major construction there and elsewhere has
been

halted in this economy. We should know in a few months when or if
work

will resume.
